data.name: AggregateConflictDetectedEventArgsAggregateRequired
data.value: A reference to the aggregate from which conflicts were detected must be provided.

data.name: AggregateConflictDetectedEventArgsEventsRequired
data.value: The events within which conflicts were detected must be provided.

data.name: AggregateConflictDetectedEventArgsNextRequired
data.value: The version at which conflicts were detected must be provided.

data.name: AggregateConflictDetectedEventArgsPreviousRequired
data.value: The version from which conflicts were detected must be provided.

data.name: AggregateConflictDetectedExceptionExistingEntryMessage
data.value: A conflict has been detected while attempting to commit changes to aggregate of type {1} with an ID of {0:p}. Version {2} was received, but version {3} has been previously committed.

data.name: AggregateConflictDetectedExceptionNoExistingEntryMessage
data.value: A conflict has been detected while attempting to commit changes to aggregate of type {1} with an ID of {0:p}. Version {2} was received, but the initial version was expected.

data.name: AggregateDoesNotExistExceptionMessage
data.value: An empty reference for aggregate type {0} cannot be retrieved.

data.name: AggregateEventMismatchExceptionMessage
data.value: Event {3:p}, version {5} of type {4} does not apply to aggregate {0:p}, version {2} of type {1}.

data.name: AggregateEventSequenceUnorderedExceptionMessage
data.value: Aggregate of type {2} with an ID of {0:p} and a version of {1} cannot accept the proposed state from history as the sequence is unordered.

data.name: AggregateHasUncommittedChangesExceptionMessage
data.value: Aggregate of type {2} with an ID of {0:p} and a version of {1} cannot accept its state from history as it current possesses uncommitted changes.

data.name: AggregateHistoryInvalidForStateExceptionMessage
data.value: Aggregate of type {2} with an ID of {0:p} and a version of {1} cannot accept the proposed sequence as it starts from version {3}.

data.name: AggregateInvariantsNotSatisfiedDomainExceptionMessage
data.value:
Request {0} could not be fulfilled due to a failure to satisfy the following invariants as defined by aggregate {1}:
{2}

data.name: AggregateNotFoundExceptionMessage
data.value: There is currently no aggregate of type {1} with an ID of {0:p}.

data.name: AggregateReconciledEventArgsAggregateRequired
data.value: A reference to the aggregate that was successfull reconciled must be provided.

data.name: AggregateReconciledEventArgsEventsRequired
data.value: The events that were successfully reconciled must be provided.

data.name: AggregateReconcilerFactoryRequired
data.value: The factory from which aggregate type specific reconcilation proxies are produced must be provided.

data.name: AggregateReferenceMismatchExceptionMessage
data.value: Reference for aggregate {0:p} of type {1} cannot be converted type {2}.

data.name: AggregateRootExtensionsCoordinateAggregateRequired
data.value: The aggregate that serves as the context for coordination must be provided.

data.name: AggregateRootExtensionsDestinationRequired
data.value: The destination must be provided.

data.name: AggregateVersionNotFoundExceptionMessage
data.value: Version {2} of aggregate type {1} with an ID of {0:p} could not be found.

data.name: AtomicUnitDistinctAggregateVersionRequired
data.value: The atomic unit must only contain changes relating to a single version increment of a single aggregate.

data.name: AtomicUnitEventsRequired
data.value: The atomic unit must contain one or more domain events.

data.name: BusMessageRequired
data.value: The message to be invoked must be provided.

data.name: CoordinatedOperationHandlerRepositoryRequired
data.value: The repository must be provided.

data.name: DomainEventAggregateReferenceRequired
data.value: A reference to the aggregate from which the domain event was raised must be provided.

data.name: DomainEventAggregateRequired
data.value: A versioned reference for the aggregate must be provided.

data.name: DomainEventPropagatorBusRequired
data.value: The bus to which the events are to be propagated must be provided.

data.name: DomainEventPropagatorRepositoryRequired
data.value: The repository from which the events are to be propagated must be provided.

data.name: DomainEventsUnhandledEventArgsHandlerRequired
data.value: The handler for the unhandled events must be provided.

data.name: EnsureReferenceIsNotEmptyMessage
data.value: A non-empty reference of aggregate type {0} is required.

data.name: EnsureReferenceIsOfTypeMessage
data.value: The reference provided is for an aggregate of type {0}. {1} is required.

data.name: EntityMaximumIdValueExceededExceptionMessage
data.value: The maximum supported ID of {0} for entity of type {1} has been exceeded.

data.name: EventCentricAggregateRootStateChangesDenied
data.value: Changed to the state of an aggregate of type {0} must be made through ApplyChanges.

data.name: GenericAggregateRequired
data.value: The aggregate must be provided.

data.name: GenericContextRequired
data.value: The context for this request must be provided.

data.name: GenericIdInvalid
data.value: A non-empty ID must be provided.

data.name: HandlerFailureExceptionMessage
data.value: Handler for message of type {0} has failed to process message {1:p} for transaction {2:p}.

data.name: MessageExtensionsCoordinateMessageRequired
data.value: The message that serves as the context for coordination must be provided.

data.name: PaginatedQueryPagingRequired
data.value: The paging instructions for this query must be provided.

data.name: PaginatedResultPagingRequired
data.value: The paging instructions that generated the results must be provided.

data.name: PersistentBusPublishFailure
data.value: An attempt to publish atomic unit {0:p} has failed.

data.name: PersistentBusStoreRequired
data.value: The storage that support persistence of domain events published via the bus must be provided.

data.name: ReferenceExtensionsCoordinateReferenceeRequired
data.value: The reference that serves as the context for coordination must be provided.

data.name: ReferenceTypeInvalid
data.value: An reference cannot be generated for abstract type {0} with an ID {1:p}.

data.name: SignedVersionPreviousFooterInvalid
data.value: The footer of previous version {0} is invalid.

data.name: SignedVersionPreviousRequired
data.value: The previous version must be provided.

data.name: UnsupportedAggregateDetectedEventArgsAggregateRequired
data.value: A reference to the aggregate for which reconciliation is not supported must be provided.

data.name: UnsupportedAggregateDetectedEventArgsEventsRequired
data.value: The events requiring reconciliation by an unsupported aggregate type must be provided.

data.name: VersionedReferenceVersionRequired
data.value: The version of the aggregate must be provided.
